articles.title: Joe DeCesaro
articles.contents:
Joe DeCesaro
          
          
          Home
          Resume
          Blog
          
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Joe DeCesaro
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            I am currently pursuing a Master’s Degree in
            Environmental Data Science (EDS) at the Bren School of
            Environmental Sciences and Management UC Santa Barbara. I
            hold a Bachelor’s Degree in Materials Engineering from Cal
            Poly – San Luis Obispo.
            Having always enjoyed spending time in the outdoors I
            want my career to focus on environmental work. After
            graduating in 2018, I worked as an environmental engineer
            consultant at Ashworth Leininger Group. My work mostly
            focused on environmental compliance for a variety of
            manufacturing facilities or building operations. Some of
            these projects included air permitting work in various
            California air districts, onsite hazardous waste and
            materials management, and writing Spill Prevention,
            Countermeasure, and Control (SPCC) Plans. One project
            investigated the reduction of carbon emissions by shifting
            away from natural gas through electrification of an energy
            intensive manufacturing process and significantly grew my
            interest in data science. With the completion of my Master’s
            program, I want to use data science to improve renewable
            energy development and implementation both in the United
            States and internationally.
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Joe DeCesaro
